line.text: %PLAYER%: Looks like we're in luck, this console works.
%PLAYER%: This is only a part of the code! The computer must have been damaged by Apocalypse's EMP blast. We're gonna have to find a computer that has the rest of the code.
%PLAYER%: This console looks to be intact. I'll see if I can't get the rest of security code from it.
%PLAYER%: This console is damaged too! We got a little more but still not the complete code. We're gonna have to find a 3rd console.
%PLAYER%: Hopefully this one will have the rest of the Genosha security codes in it.
%PLAYER%: Professor Xavier, we did it! We have the entire security code to Genosha.
line.textb: %PLAYER%: We have the entire security code, Xavier.

line.text: %ProfX%: Well done. Return with it to the Sanctuary at your earliest convenience. Angel arrived a short time ago and he has some interesting news on how that code can be put to use.
line.textb: %ProfX%: That's excellent news. Return to the Sanctuary as soon as possible. Angel just arrived and he's discovered an intriguing location that requires the code.
